text: A lot of action movies today seem to have scenes that just lead up to the action.
author: Jason Statham

text: How many movies do you see when you can say this director really knew what film he wanted to make? I can count them on the fingers of one hand.
author: Gary Oldman

text: I have three kids who like Harry Potter so I was sort of aware of it. You can't really move from it: it's on buses, in stores, it's everywhere. One of my kids has read the books the other two are too small but they like the movies.
author: Gary Oldman

text: The movies I watch and the music I listen to and the books I read - those are important to me. It's very important to me, and I don't know what I would do without those things.
author: Joseph Gordon-Levitt

text: We can now have action movies with two stars where one might be African American and one might be Asian American. One of them doesn't have to be white, and the other one doesn't have to be the ethnic sidekick. We're way over that. And I think it's happening in society, too.
author: Roger Ebert
